summary: Core job-application logging UI and motivational elements were added, but key requested behaviors are missing: a simple one-tap increment action (REQ-1), deletion of entries and corresponding count updates (REQ-2/REQ-3), and the required generated image asset file under the specified public path (REQ-6). Backend persistence is keyed by caller principal but lacks delete/stats methods and uses in-memory Maps only. Several unrequested features were added (user profile setup, access-control initialization, caffeine.ai footer attribution).

missing_requirements.requirement: Provide a primary action that increments the total applications counter by exactly 1 with immediate visual feedback.
missing_requirements.reason: The UI derives the total from entries length and provides a form to log an entry, but there is no single primary button like “I applied today” that increments by 1 without requiring extra fields; the form requires company and role, so it is not a simple increment action as specified.

missing_requirements.requirement: Allow deleting an application entry and update the total counter accordingly.
missing_requirements.reason: There is no delete UI in the recent entries list and no backend delete method exposed; therefore the total cannot update after deletion.

missing_requirements.requirement: Backend exposes query/update methods needed to fetch stats+entries, add entry, and delete entry (and/or recompute stats), with persistence keyed by the signed-in principal across sessions.
missing_requirements.reason: The backend provides methods to add and fetch entries for the caller, but does not provide any delete-entry method or a stats method; frontend also lacks corresponding hooks/mutations. Persistence is in-memory Maps; the diff does not show stable storage for retention beyond canister lifecycle events.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the generated image asset under frontend/public/assets/generated and render it on the home screen without fetching from the backend.
missing_requirements.reason: Home screen references the expected path, but the diff summary does not show the actual image file being added under frontend/public/assets/generated.

hallucinated_features.description: User profile creation/storage flow (name prompt dialog) and related backend profile APIs.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest focuses on application counting/log entries and motivation UI; it does not request user profile capture or profile persistence APIs.

hallucinated_features.description: Authorization/access-control initialization via secret admin token and permission checks.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not specify an admin-token based access-control system or role permissions; only principal-keyed data persistence is required.

hallucinated_features.description: Caffeine.ai attribution footer with tracking parameters.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested as part of the app requirements and adds external-link attribution/tracking logic.
